basics.name: Anjan Kumar Reddy Ayyadapu
basics.label: Leader Solution Architect
basics.summary: Anjan Kumar Reddy Ayyadapu is a Big data Solutions Architect leader, leading Edge to AI Platform Solutions at Cloudera.

work.name: Cloudera Inc.
work.summary: Anjan Kumar Reddy Ayyadapu is a Big data Solutions Architect leader, leading Edge to AI Platform Solutions at Cloudera.

volunteer.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE)
volunteer.summary: Anjan Kumar Reddy Ayyadapu is a Senior Member, Author, and Reviewer for IEEE, contributing to the advancement of technology through research publications, peer reviews, and thought leadership. With extensive expertise in AI/ML, Big Data, Cyber Security, and Cloud Computing, he plays a pivotal role in evaluating and shaping high-impact research. His involvement includes reviewing scholarly articles, mentoring researchers, and authoring technical papers on emerging technologies. Through his IEEE contributions, he actively supports innovation and knowledge dissemination in the global technology community.
highlights: Authored two IEEE conference papers and peer-reviewed four research articles for prestigious IEEE conferences, including the 5th International Conference on Electrical, Computer, and Energy Technologies (ICECET 2025) and the IEEE International Conference on AI and Data Analytics (ICAD 2025).

volunteer.summary: Proud to have served as a judge for the 2025 Artificial Intelligence Excellence Awards h hosted by the Business Intelligence Group! The AI innovations I reviewed were nothing short of game-changing.
highlights: I was honored to receive the Excellence Award Judge recognition for serving as a judge for the 2025 Artificial Intelligence Excellence Awards!

volunteer.summary: As a member of the research community at Harvard Business Review Advisory Council, I will provide the insight to shape the content we develop and enrich our understanding & also provide my perspective on ideas from Harvard Business Review and the wider world of management and leadership

The IEEE Robotics and Automation Society's objectives are scientific, literary and educational in character. The Society strives for the advancement of the theory and practice of robotics and automation engineering and science and of the allied arts and sciences, and for the maintenance of high professional standards among its members, all in consonance with the Constitution and Bylaws of the IEEE and with special attention to such aims within the Field of Interest of the Society.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
